mdRecord.dcterms:title: I Ought to Be in Pictures by Neil Simon
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for I Ought to Be in Pictures by Neil Simon. Directed by Ken Costigan. Sep 1-26, 1982. 50th Anniversary Season.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
